title: Unveiling the heavy-metal ion critical role in γ-dicalcium silicate: from solidification to early hydration
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11400-11410
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01214C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Heyu Lu, Zhaohui Liu, Xiao Zhi, Jiayuan Ye, Jieshuo Wan, Daizhixuan Ai, Neng Li
The solidification mechanism of harmful metal ions in γ-C2S and the effects on hydration were studied through well-defined ab initio calculations.
